p: Interestingly, R2 Italian essential oil showed stronger activity against AChE enzyme compared to other rosemary essential oils previously investigated. Ben Jemia et al. [ 20] confirmed the neuroprotective activity of S. rosmarinus essential oil from Tunisia. In this study, eight essential oils were screened and the best results were observed for samples collected in Matmata and Dj. Khamess with IC 50 value of 64.7 against AChE.
